price: (53) And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-hudā wa-awrathnā banī is'rāīla al-kitāba
